**Tender Description:**
------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issues this request for proposal (RFP) for the refit of CCGS Pierre Radisson, a Canadian Coast Guard Ship, in Quebec City, Quebec.

The scope of work includes:

* Concerted repair and maintenance work on the ship during the 2022 Fall layout, in accordance with Technical Specifications (Annex A) and related drawings.
* Performance of any unscheduled and approved work not covered in the above.

**Important:**
* The closing time for bid submission has been modified. Please submit all required supporting documentation and bids at the latest by 2:00 PM EDT on 2022-10-13. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.
